description:
Tony Graham Automotive Group 
Job Title 
Detailer
Report to 
Service Manager
Location 
299 West Hunt Club Road Ottawa, ON K2E 1A6 – On-Site
Employment Status 
Full-time permanent
Closing Date
Until filled
Who We Are? 
The Tony Graham Automotive Group (TGAG) is a reputable and established business, with over 50 years in the Ottawa area. Our group consists of Tony Graham Toyota, Tony Graham Lexus, Kanata Toyota, Tony Graham AutoEdge, Collision Center, and AADA Leasing. We recognize that our employees define us; we cannot deliver a great customer experience without a talented team. The car industry is a constantly changing, fast-paced industry that offers fulfilling careers and competitive salaries. It is a huge industry with jobs available in all segments, room for growth, and a wide array of choices for both those who are looking to jumpstart an exciting career or change career paths. We offer a unique, diverse, and dynamic work environment.
Job Summary 
Detail vehicles as per the requirements and quality assurance program determined by Lexus Reflections. This includes washing, waxing and/or polishing the exterior of the vehicle, and cleaning/shampooing the interior of the vehicle, as required satisfying customer needs and dealership expectations of high quality and workmanship.
What we offer You will work in a dynamic workplace with people who live the values of our organization and will enjoy many of the benefits and opportunities at Tony Graham Automotive Group, including:

 Participation in TGAG group benefit plan after three months and participation in the
 RRSP/DPSP after two years
 Reimbursement of recertification and designation costs
 Professional development opportunities
 Staff discounts on new and used car sales and parts and service rates
 Paid birthday leave
 Employees can purchase parts on behalf of their family members and obtain the employee discount

Reasons why you’ll enjoy working with Tony Graham Automotive Group 

 Career Development: Internal hiring is a big part of our recruitment process. We encourage our employees to strive for more challenging roles in the workplace
 The safety of our employees is our top priority. We ensure that we stay compliant with the Ontario Occupational Health & Safety Act and Regulations
 Paid Training/Professional development opportunities
 Paid birthday leave – We offer our employees to have the opportunity to take their birthday off paid
 Welcoming work culture & great workplace environment

What you offer 
General Responsibilities: 

 Clean customer vehicles inside and out as per Lexus Reflections and/or Service Advisor guidelines
 Valet vehicles neatly and with care in delivery area or on lot in accordance with policy and best practices
 Maintain all clean-up areas including floors and benches, etc. in a clean, organized and safe fashion
 Return equipment to its appropriate place in good working order and condition
 Report to management any circumstance or condition that compromises the integrity or safety of the dealership, personnel, or customers
 Show common courtesy to all customers and dealership personnel and promote every aspect of the Tony Graham Automotive Group to the client
 Use the supplies and materials in a safe, practical, and economical manner
 Maintain a good work attitude and cooperate with the managers and fellow employees in the positive spirit of teamwork
 Work in compliance with all applicable policies, procedures and legislation
 Any other duties, as assigned

The successful candidate will have the following: 
Education and Qualification 

 Completion of Secondary School
 Valid Driver’s Licence and acceptable Driver’s Abstract
 Clean driving record, and reporting to management any circumstances regarding the status of this license

Language 

 Fluent in English, oral and written
 Bilingualism, an asset

Skills & Abilities 

 Mature personality and sound judgement skills
 Effective interpersonal and communication skills
 Automotive background required
 Ability to drive both standard and automatic transmissions
 Ability to maintain professionalism at all times
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and ensure attention to detail
 Good initiative, ambitious
 Strong team player with the ability to work independently
 Reliable, professional and responsible;

Schedule: 
Monday – Friday:
Opening Hours: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm
Occasional Seasonal Saturday
Pay Structure: 
$16.55 - $18.00 per hour based on experience in the field
Plus Production Bonus
(Estimated Annual Income - $40,000)
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: $16.55-$18.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Company events
 Dental care
 Disability insurance
 Discounted or free food
 Employee assistance program
 Extended health care
 Life insurance
 On-site parking
 Paid time off
 RRSP match
 Store discount
 Vision care
 Wellness program

Schedule:

 Day shift
 Monday to Friday
 Weekends as needed

Supplemental pay types:

 Bonus pay

Ability to Commute:

 Ottawa, ON (required)

Work Location: In person
